content.text: Kanban boards provide visual task management with draggable columns and cards. They sync in real-time like all Nightjar documents.

content.caption: A kanban board with draggable columns and task cards.

content.text: Kanban boards use @dnd-kit for drag-and-drop, providing full touch support on mobile devices. Cards and columns can be dragged with a finger â€” a brief hold (250ms) activates the drag to avoid interfering with scrolling. A drag overlay shows the item being moved for clear visual feedback.

items: Edit the card title and description.
Add comments to discuss the task with collaborators.

content.text: All board changes sync instantly. Multiple people can drag cards and edit details simultaneously.
